articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Why do LLMs make stuff up? New research peers under the hood. - Ars Technica
articles.description: Claude’s faulty “known entity” neurons sometime override its “don’t answer” circuitry.

articles.title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 2 To Share Same Cluster As Snapdragon 8 Elite, But Mass Produced On TSMC’s Newer 3nm ‘N3P’ Technology, Along With An Adreno 840 GPU Upgrade And More - Wccftech
articles.description: A tipster has shared some specifications of Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 2, stating that it will share the same CPU cluster as the Snapdragon 8 Elite
articles.content: Qualcomm will announce its second flagship SoC for smartphones that will feature its in-house Oryon cores, retaining the approach that it kept with the Snapdragon 8 Elite. Naturally, we should expect… [+2604 chars]
